name: tex-textlint
description: TeX auto calibration using textlint + prh

scripts.textlint-check: cp ${npm_package_config_texpath} output.txt && $(npm bin)/textlint output.txt && { rm output.txt ; exit 0 ; } || { rm output.txt ; exit 1 ; }
scripts.textlint-fix: cp ${npm_package_config_texpath} output.txt && $(npm bin)/textlint --fix output.txt && cp output.txt ${npm_package_config_texpath} && { rm output.txt ; exit 0 ; } || { rm output.txt ; exit 1 ; }
